description.value: An easy way to trick others is to throw your voice into a nearby forest or thicket to make strange noises. You can cast 2nd-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Ventriloquism] as an innate primal spell once per day. You can also cast the figment cantrip as a primal innate spell at will, heightened to a spell rank equal to half your level rounded up.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Tian Xia Character Guide
